entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
